title: Suggestion for Typophile
content:
Hey I wasn’t sure where to put suggestions so I’ll just put one here.  
I think it would be cool if Typophile handled images a little differently, where if you have a wide image it could be clicked on to expand. Look at the forums at [http://www.dpreview.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907165801/http:/www.dpreview.com/ "http://www.dpreview.com") (Photo website) Images are previewed at a certain width but can be expanded if you click on it, so you don’t have a scroll bar. I think this would be the cats pajamas. I don’t know what that means but I think it’s good.
